Description: Rim sherd of Chian, possibly Grand Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; exterior: rim pattern consisting of simple broken maeander above frieze of billets alternating with blanks filled with squares. Graffito on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis) (noted on Gardner's plate)
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 720, no. 384)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0750) (phase 2)
